name: Kindred Realms
description:
Kindred Realms aims to be a light survival, action rpg, fantasy life simulator.

Interact with the environment, craft hundred of items, experience dynamic weather and realtime lighting, own land, master your profession, grow crops, become an architect, go on quests, and much more!

I do not have a save game state yet. Work in progress...

https://discord.gg/Kmf5nCuCGq

Be a part of the world, not the focus, with characters that have their own lives and skills: fighting, marketing, cultivating, etc...

Current State Of Development:

Development Alpha v 0.5b

Canvas doesn't scale with resolution. Use 1920x1080.

Tested with Ryzen 5 3600 CPU, GeForce 1660ti GPU, 16GB RAM, and NVMe SSD.

Please leave any comments, feedback, or questions. And if interested, take a look at the devlog below.

Developer Console (~): 
quit
respawn
additem
(additem is case and space sensitive)

Controls:
left shift - run
tab/i - inventory
q - crafting
j - journal
e - interact with item
mouse wheel - switch active hotbar item
esc - close game menus / cancel placing item / open main menu

In Inventory:
right click - Place Item / Eat Item / Equip Item / Store Item / etc
shift right click - Drop Item

Placing Item:
mouse wheel - rotate
r - adjust height (if applicable)
f - swap design (if applicable)
